item.title: 为什么我们在 "交换位置 "领域
item.description:
市场的表现就像机器重新启动了一样。它们还能以同样的方式运行吗？【原文：

Markets are behaving like the machines have been turned back on. Can they still run the same way?

】

item.title: 日本股市因关税平息而上涨，丰田汽车因收购报告而大涨
item.description: 由于贸易谈判取得进展以及日元略微走软，刺激了风险偏好，日本股市升至唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）宣布所谓的互惠关税之前从未有过的水平。【原文：Japan’s shares rose to levels not seen since before Donald Trump’s so-called reciprocal tariff announcement, as progress in trade talks and a slightly weaker yen fueled risk appetite.】

item.title: 曾是金融科技明星的英国股权众筹陷入困境
item.description: 股权众筹曾是金融科技最热门的趋势之一，它让数百万散户投资者有机会通过持有欧洲最热门初创企业的股份而淘金。如今，这一行业似乎失去了光彩，越来越少的公司利用它来筹集资金，而不断下挫的估值也让一些早期支持者尝到了苦果。【原文：Once one of fintech’s hottest trends, equity crowdfunding gave millions of retail investors a chance to strike gold by owning a stake in Europe’s buzziest startups. These days the sector seems to have lost its sparkle, with fewer companies using it to raise cash and sinking valuations leaving some early backers with a bitter taste.】

item.title: 新加坡金管局称：旷日持久的贸易战可能进一步拖累新加坡经济增长
item.description: 新加坡央行警告说，长期的全球贸易战可能会给经济增长和通货膨胀带来更大的风险，而首轮关税已经将打击新加坡60%的对美出口。【原文：Singapore’s central bank warned a prolonged global trade war could pose even greater risks to growth and inflation, with the initial round of tariffs already set to hit 60% of the city-state’s exports to the US.】

item.title: 小米支持的机器人真空吸尘器品牌 Roborock 据称考虑在香港上市
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，机器人真空吸尘器制造商北京罗博洛克科技有限公司（Beijing Roborock Technology Co.【原文：Robot vacuum maker Beijing Roborock Technology Co. is weighing a share sale in Hong Kong this year to raise as much as $500 million, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 嘉吉认为贸易战对其巴西大豆压榨计划构成风险
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普与中国的贸易战可能有利于巴西的大豆出口，但嘉吉公司（Cargill Inc.【原文：US President Donald Trump’s trade war with China may be beneficial for Brazil’s soybean exports, but Cargill Inc.’s top executive in the country sees a risk to the company’s plans to expand oilseed crushing capacity.】

item.title: 埃及称将从亚洲基础设施投资银行获得 3 亿美元预算支持
item.description: 据一位高级官员透露，埃及即将从亚洲基础设施投资银行获得 3 亿美元的预算支持。【原文：Egypt is close to getting $300 million of budget support from the Asian Infrastructure Investment Bank, according to a top official.】

item.title: 美国加征关税，中国重申支持就业和经济的承诺
item.description: 由于与特朗普政府的贸易战仍在继续，且看不到立即停止的迹象，中国官员重申了加强对就业和经济支持的计划。【原文：Chinese officials reiterated their plan to strengthen support for employment and the economy, as a trade war with the Trump administration continues with no immediate off-ramp in sight.】

item.title: 信实集团盈利超预期或将提振印度大盘股
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 恒瑞医药获中国监管机构批准出售香港股票
item.description: 江苏恒瑞医药股份有限公司从中国证券监管机构获得了在香港上市的绿灯，这使这家中国制药商离出售股份更近了一步，出售股份的价格可能高达 20 亿美元。【原文：Jiangsu Hengrui Pharmaceuticals Co. received the green light from China’s securities regulator for its Hong Kong listing, putting the Chinese drugmaker a step closer to a share sale that may fetch as much as $2 billion.】

item.title: 贝恩资本获得印度汽车零部件制造商 Dhoot 的收购贷款
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，贝恩资本（Bain Capital LP）已获得 1.36 亿美元贷款，用于收购印度汽车零部件制造商 Dhoot Transmission Group 的少数股权。【原文：Bain Capital LP has obtained a $136 million loan to finance its acquisition of a minority stake in Dhoot Transmission Group, an Indian manufacturer of automotive parts, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 特朗普削减经费后，全球吸引美国研究人员的竞争加剧
item.description: 随着唐纳德-特朗普总统大刀阔斧地削减科学资金和联邦机构，一场招募美国研究人员和医生的全球竞赛正在白热化。【原文：A global race to recruit US researchers and doctors is heating up as President Donald Trump’s sweeping cuts to science funding and federal agencies disrupt the country’s research landscape.】

item.title: S&P 警告澳大利亚的 AAA 评级因大选承诺而面临风险
item.description: S&P全球评级公司警告说，如果竞选承诺导致结构性赤字、债务和利息成本增加，澳大利亚珍贵的AAA主权信用评级可能面临风险，这凸显了下届政府面临的财政压力。【原文：S&P Global Ratings warned Australia’s prized AAA sovereign credit rating may be at risk if election campaign pledges result in larger structural deficits, debt and interest costs, highlighting fiscal pressures facing the next government.】

item.title: 成本飙升，林纳斯稀土公司寻求美国援助德克萨斯州炼油厂
item.description: 澳大利亚林纳斯稀土有限公司（Lynas Rare Earths Ltd.）正在与特朗普政府谈判，以应对其在得克萨斯州建设的炼油厂成本上升的问题，同时警告说总统的关税议程可能会威胁到该项目。【原文：Australia’s Lynas Rare Earths Ltd. is in talks with the Trump administration to counter rising costs for the refinery it’s building in Texas, while at the same time warning that the president’s tariff agenda could threaten the project.】

item.title: 特朗普对华加征关税将给美国经济带来供应冲击
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统的关税攻势已让华盛顿和华尔街骚动了近一个月。如果贸易战持续下去，下一场动荡将在更近的地方发生。【原文：President Donald Trump’s tariff onslaught has roiled Washington and Wall Street for nearly a month. If the trade war persists, the next upheaval will hit much closer to home.】

item.title: 新加坡科技部称新加坡在美国关税谈判中寻求药品优惠
item.description: 新加坡正在寻求对美药品出口的减让，承认 10%的基准关税不会放松。【原文：Singapore is seeking concessions on pharmaceutical exports to the US, acknowledging that a 10% baseline tariff will not be eased.】

item.title: 受降息押注和黄金价格影响，泰国债券迎来大量资金流入
item.description: 在降息押注和金价飙升导致泰铢走强的帮助下，泰国债券市场有望创下三年多来的最佳月度流入量。【原文：Thailand’s bond market is on course for its best monthly inflows in more than three years, helped by interest-rate-cut bets and a stronger baht due to surging gold prices.】

item.title: 丰田汽车股价将因可能的收购而大涨
item.description: 彭博社报道丰田汽车公司（Toyota Motor Corp.丰田董事长丰田章男提出收购建议后，丰田汽车股价周一大涨。【原文：Shares of Toyota Industries Corp. were poised to soar Monday after Bloomberg reported that Toyota Motor Corp. Chairman Akio Toyoda had proposed a buyout.】

item.title: 中国大宗商品企业等待减产挽救利润
item.description: 中国大宗商品生产商的盈利能力仍严重落后于其他行业，市场正等待减产来缓解价格下行压力。【原文：The profitability of Chinese commodities producers is still heavily lagging other sectors as markets wait on output cuts to relieve the downward pressure on prices.】

item.title: 中国企业向印度出口商求助以帮助完成美国订单
item.description: 一些受美国关税重创的中国企业正主动联系印度出口商，请他们代为完成订单，并帮助他们留住美国客户，因为他们正在应对一场给全球商业带来剧烈震荡的贸易战。【原文：Some China-based firms hit hard by US tariffs are reaching out to Indian exporters to fill orders on their behalf and help them retain their American customers as they navigate a trade war causing seismic shocks in global commerce.】

item.title: 创纪录反弹后看涨情绪减弱，黄金跌幅扩大
item.description: 黄金从上周创下的纪录高位进一步回落，原因是有迹象表明，黄金的爆炸性涨势可能涨得太猛、太快，交易商因此平仓。【原文：Gold fell further from last week’s record high, as traders unwound positions on signs the metal’s explosive rally may have run too hard and too fast.】

item.title: 经济风险加剧，日本央行将暂停加息步伐
item.description: 由于美国关税加剧了全球不确定性，市场普遍预计日本央行本周将发出暂停政策正常化的信号，但不会改变在前景明朗时逐步提高利率的立场。【原文：The Bank of Japan is widely expected to signal a pause in policy normalization this week as US tariffs heighten global uncertainty, without shifting its stance on gradually raising interest rates when the outlook clears.】

item.title: 贸易战和中国前景凸显，石油价格走高
item.description: 在经历了波动剧烈的一周后，交易商分析了贸易战的最新信号，准备了解中国如何支持其经济的细节，并权衡了伊朗的地缘政治事态发展，因此石油走高。【原文：Oil ticked higher after a volatile week as traders parsed the latest signals in the trade war, prepared for details of how China aims to support its economy, and weighed geopolitical developments in Iran.】

item.title: 关税打击投资，英国经济增长前景遭项目俱乐部下调
item.description: 据易观国际项目俱乐部（EY Item Club）称，由于唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的全面关税打击了商业投资，英国经济在 2026 年的增长速度将只有之前预期的一半。【原文：The UK economy will grow half as quickly as previously expected in 2026 as Donald Trump’s sweeping tariffs hit business investment, according to EY Item Club.】

item.title: 特朗普承诺市场繁荣。100 天过去了，股市只看到了损害
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普曾向美国人承诺，如果他们选他当总统，将迎来 "前所未有的繁荣"。但从他上任头 100 天的股市表现来看，这取决于你所说的 "繁荣 "是什么意思。【原文：Donald Trump promised Americans a “boom like no other” if they elected him president. But based on the stock market’s performance during his first 100 days in office, it depends on what you mean by “boom.”】

item.title: 新加坡大选投资者指南
item.description: 在新加坡大选之前，保证政策的连续性和支持经济的措施将是许多投资者最关心的问题，因为市场仍然受到美国加征关税的压力。【原文：Assurances of policy continuity and supportive measures for the economy will be top of mind for many investors ahead of Singapore’s elections as markets remain pressured from US-imposed tariffs.】

item.title: 亚洲投资者关注中国，开盘后交易谨慎：市场综述
item.description: 本周亚洲市场开局谨慎，投资者在等待中国可能采取进一步刺激措施的迹象，以及美国与该地区贸易谈判的进展。【原文：Asian markets are set for a cautious start to the week as investors await signs of potential further stimulus from China and progress in US trade negotiations with the region.】

item.title: 新加坡银行主导股票回购潮
item.description: 新加坡的贷款机构正在利用近期股价疲软的机会回购股票，占企业回购总额的大部分，这将是新加坡四年来最大的一次企业回购。【原文：Singapore lenders are taking advantage of recent weakness in their share prices to purchase stock, making up the bulk of total corporate buybacks that are set to be the biggest in the city-state in four years.】

item.title: 本周全球商品市场值得关注的五大图表
item.description: 购买液化石油气的中国塑料工厂正转向中东，以替代受关税影响的美国进口。随着新合同在芝加哥启动，春小麦贸易的争夺战已经打响。美国对从东南亚四国进口的太阳能电池板设置了新的关税。【原文：Chinese plastics plants that buy liquefied petroleum gas are turning to the Middle East to replace tariff-hit imports from the US. The battle for over spring-wheat trading has begun with new contracts launching in Chicago. And the US has set new duties on imports of solar panels from fourth Southeast Asian countries.】

item.title: 日本企业债券交易复苏凸显融资需求
item.description: 日本企业发行商正在重启一些被搁置的日元债券交易，这表明即使投资者寻求更高的溢价，他们的融资需求也十分迫切。【原文：Japanese corporate issuers are rekindling some shelved yen bond deals in a sign of pressing funding needs even as investors seek fatter premiums.】
